img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Karma_1.jpg)
The large forested field beyond the Forest of Felicity's canyon is fairly wide open, and as you exit the canyon you'll find a few small trails leading to the right, left and straight ahead.
img_below_text:
Take the left path first, and past a Monk Supporter enemy you'll be able to find the top of a stream, similar to the Brook of Bliss, that hugs that wraps around the far side of this region.
![Wukong Karma 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Karma_3.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 75 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Karma 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Karma_1.jpg)
The large forested field beyond the Forest of Felicity's canyon is fairly wide open, and as you exit the canyon you'll find a few small trails leading to the right, left and straight ahead."
            - Following Text: "Take the left path first, and past a Monk Supporter enemy you'll be able to find the top of a stream, similar to the Brook of Bliss, that hugs that wraps around the far side of this region.
![Wukong Karma 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Karma_3.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist, Wukong, is engaged in combat with a formidable enemy in a snowy forest. This encounter occurs in the Valley of Ecstasy, following the exit from the Forest of Felicity's canyon. The image serves to illustrate the challenging battles players will face as they navigate the various paths and regions within the game.
